byline.contributor: James Kanter and Aurelien Breeden contributed reporting.

abstract: Chief Paris prosecutor Francois Molins opens formal investigation against Ayoub El Khazzani for attempted murder in connection with terrorist act; says suspect watched Jihadist videos just before foiled attack on Amsterdam-Paris train.
lead_paragraph: Ayoub El Khazzani, who is in French custody, watched a YouTube video encouraging violent acts right before he began the attack, a prosecutor said.

headline.main: French Train Attack Suspect Viewed Jihadist Video, Official Says
headline.print_headline: Suspect Viewed Jihadist Videos Before Train Attack, French Say

snippet: Ayoub El Khazzani, who is in French custody, watched a YouTube video encouraging violent acts right before he began the attack, a prosecutor said.
